description:
The Crowe Microstripe t-shirt is a premium fitted tall tee that was carefully crafted to make tall men feel confident and comfortable. This tall t-shirt feels amazing and fits tall guys with grace. Navas Lab is the leader in functional tall guys clothes and the Crowe Microstripe is a practical t-shirt you can wear in almost any situation. At Navas, they are tall guys too so they know that tall, slim guys everywhere still struggle to find shirts that fit properly and look good. If you’re tired of XXXL and Big&Tall t-shirts don’t look or feel good, you have found your new favorite tee.

Their Crowe Microstripe premium tee comes loaded with features you will only find at Navas Lab. From the fabric they use to the perfect fit for tall guys - they are passionate about every aspect of the clothing they produce. The proven anti-odour properties of their bamboo fabric makes this tall t-shirt a must-have in any wardrobe. The cut is ideal for tall slim guys and the look is perfect for any event.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Crowe Microstripe - Tall Crew Tee - Mens
